Post.title: Gradient descent method
Post.author: GaoPan
Post._content:
# 

<!--more-->
## 
$f(\boldsymbol{x})$, $\boldsymbol{x}^k$$\boldsymbol{d}^k$ $\boldsymbol{x}^{k+1} = \boldsymbol{x}^k + \alpha \boldsymbol{d}^k$$\alpha$$\boldsymbol{d}^k$

$$
f(\boldsymbol{x}^k + \alpha \boldsymbol{d}^k) = f(\boldsymbol{x}^k) + \alpha\nabla f(\boldsymbol{x}^k)^\top \boldsymbol{d}^k + \mathcal{O}(\alpha^2\|\boldsymbol{d}^k\|^2)
$$
$\boldsymbol{d}^k$$\nabla f(\boldsymbol{x}^k)^\top \boldsymbol{d}^k$$\boldsymbol{d}^k$ $\boldsymbol{d}^k = -\nabla f(\boldsymbol{x}^k)$. 
$$
\boldsymbol{x}^{k+1} = \boldsymbol{x}^k - \alpha \nabla f(\boldsymbol{x}^k)
$$
$\alpha$

## -LASSO
LASSOLASSOL1
$$
\min f(\boldsymbol{x}) = \frac{1}{2}\|A\boldsymbol{x}- b\|^2 + \mu\|\boldsymbol{x}\|_1
$$
LASSOL1L1
$$l_{\delta}(x)=\begin{cases}\frac{1}{2\delta}x^{2},&|x|<\delta,\\|x|-\frac{\delta}{2},&\text{}.&&&\end{cases}$$
$\delta\rightarrow0$$l_{\delta}(x)$$|x|$LASSO
$$
\min f(\boldsymbol{x}) = \frac{1}{2}\|A\boldsymbol{x}- b\|^2 + \mu L_{\delta}(x),
$$
$\mu$$\delta$$L_{\delta}(x)=\sum_i^nl_\delta(x_i)$
LASSO
$$\nabla f_\delta(x)=A^\mathrm{T}(Ax-b)+\mu\nabla L_\delta(x),$$
$\nabla L_\delta(x)$
$$(\nabla L_{\delta}(x))_{i}=\begin{cases}\mathrm{sign}(x_{i}),&|x_{i}|>\delta,\\\frac{x_{i}}{\delta},&|x_{i}|\leqslant\delta.&&&\end{cases}$$

Post.author: GaoPan
Post._content:
## (SOCP)
(Second-order cone program)
## SOCP
SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\min   & \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x}\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \|\boldsymbol{A}_i\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i\|_2 \leq \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top \boldsymbol{x} + d_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m 
\end{array}
$$
$A_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i\times n},\boldsymbol{b}_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i},\boldsymbol{c}_i\in\mathbb{R}^n,d_i\in\mathbb{R},\boldsymbol{x}\in\mathbb{R}^n, i=1,\ldots,m$

<!--more-->


$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\max   & -\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{u}_i^\top \boldsymbol{b}_i + v_id_i)\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \sum_{i=1}^m \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{u}_i + \sum_{i=1}^mv_i\boldsymbol{c}_i = \boldsymbol{f},\quad i=1,\ldots,m, \\
&\|\boldsymbol{u}_i\|_2\leq v_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{u}_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$v_i\in\mathbb{R}$$i=1,\ldots,m$

## : 
$\boldsymbol{y}_i = \boldsymbol{A}_i\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i$$t_i = \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top + d_i$SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\min   & \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x}\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2 \leq t_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
& \boldsymbol{y}_i = \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
& t_i = \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x}+d_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{\lambda}\in\mathbb{R}^m,\boldsymbol{\mu}_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i},i=1,\ldots,m\boldsymbol{\nu}\in\mathbb{R}^m$
$$\begin{aligned}
L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})& =  \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \sum_{i=1}^m\lambda_i(\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2 -t_i) + \sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top(\boldsymbol{y}_i-\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{b}_i) + \sum_{i=1}^m\nu_i(t_i - \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x})\\
&=  (\boldsymbol{f}-\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top -\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{u}_i\boldsymbol{c}_i)^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \sum_{i=1}^m(\lambda_i\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2+\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{y}_i) \\
&\quad+ \sum_{i=1}^m(-\lambda_i+\nu_i)t_i-\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{b}_i+\nu_id_i)
\end{aligned}
$$

$$\begin{aligned}
p^\star = \min_{\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}}\max_{\boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu}} L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})
\end{aligned}
$$

$$\begin{aligned}
d^\star = \max_{\boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu}}\min_{\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}} L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})
\end{aligned}
$$
$\boldsymbol{x}$$\min$
$$
\boldsymbol{f}-\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top -\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{u}_i\boldsymbol{c}_i = 0,
$$

$\boldsymbol{y}_i$$\min$
$$
\min_{\boldsymbol{y}} \lambda_i\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2+\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{y}_i = \left\{\begin{array}{ll}{0}&{\|\boldsymbol{\mu}_{i}\|_{2}\leq\lambda_{i}}\\{-\infty}&{\mathrm{otherwise}.}\end{array}\right.
$$
$\lambda_i = \nu_i$$\boldsymbol{t}$$\min$
SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\max   & -\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{b}_i+\nu_id_i)\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \boldsymbol{f} - \sum_{i=1}^m \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{\mu}_i - \sum_{i=1}^m\nu_i\boldsymbol{c}_i =0,\quad i=1,\ldots,m, \\
&\|\boldsymbol{\mu}_i\|\leq \lambda_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,\\
&-\lambda_i+\nu_i=0, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{\mu}_i=\boldsymbol{u}_i, \lambda_i=\nu_i=v_i$SOCP

## 
(RC)
$$\begin{aligned}&\min\quad c^\top x\\
&\mathrm{s.~t.}\quad(a_i+u_i)^Tx\leq b_i\text{ for all }\|u_i\|_2\leq1,\quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{aligned}$$
$a_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$b_i\in\mathbb{R}$$u_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$c\in\mathbb{R}^n$
$u_i$$\ell_2$$\|u_i\|_2\leq1$
RC:
$$\begin{aligned}&\min\quad c^Tx\\&\mathrm{s.~t.}\quad a_i^Tx+\|x\|_2\leq b_i,\quad i=1,\ldots,m,\end{aligned}$$


## Python
CVXPYSOCP
```python
import cvxpy as cp
import numpy as np

# Generate a random feasible SOCP.
m = 3
n = 5
np.random.seed(2)
c = np.random.random(n)
A = np.random.random((m, n))
x0 = np.random.random(n)
b = A@x0

x = cp.Variable(n)
obj = cp.Minimize(c @ x)
soc_constraints = [
    cp.SOC(b[i] - A[i]@x, x) for i in range(m)
]
prob = cp.Problem(obj, soc_constraints)
prob.solve()
print("status:", prob.status)
print("optimal value", prob.value)
print("optimal var", x.value)
for i in range(m):
    print("soc constraint", soc_constraints[i].dual_value)
```

```
status: optimal
optimal value -2.487555966760468
optimal var [-1.37881038 -0.81856901 -1.7036923  -1.23789512 -0.9273785 ]
soc constraint [array([3.71192161]), array([[1.82467162],
       [1.08325999],
       [2.25507434],
       [1.63818725],
       [1.22738155]])]
soc constraint [array([1.2546655]), array([[0.61681542],
       [0.36620225],
       [0.76212621],
       [0.55379853],
       [0.41483849]])]
soc constraint [array([3.29587551e-08]), array([[1.10774611e-08],
       [8.15413818e-10],
       [1.51970753e-08],
       [1.14059208e-08],
       [1.06823249e-08]])]
```

## (SOCP)
(Second-order cone program)
## SOCP
SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\min   & \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x}\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \|\boldsymbol{A}_i\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i\|_2 \leq \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top \boldsymbol{x} + d_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m 
\end{array}
$$
$A_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i\times n},\boldsymbol{b}_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i},\boldsymbol{c}_i\in\mathbb{R}^n,d_i\in\mathbb{R},\boldsymbol{x}\in\mathbb{R}^n, i=1,\ldots,m$

<!--more-->


$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\max   & -\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{u}_i^\top \boldsymbol{b}_i + v_id_i)\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \sum_{i=1}^m \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{u}_i + \sum_{i=1}^mv_i\boldsymbol{c}_i = \boldsymbol{f},\quad i=1,\ldots,m, \\
&\|\boldsymbol{u}_i\|_2\leq v_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{u}_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$v_i\in\mathbb{R}$$i=1,\ldots,m$

## : 
$\boldsymbol{y}_i = \boldsymbol{A}_i\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i$$t_i = \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top + d_i$SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\min   & \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x}\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2 \leq t_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
& \boldsymbol{y}_i = \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \boldsymbol{b}_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
& t_i = \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x}+d_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m \\
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{\lambda}\in\mathbb{R}^m,\boldsymbol{\mu}_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i},i=1,\ldots,m\boldsymbol{\nu}\in\mathbb{R}^m$
$$\begin{aligned}
L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})& =  \boldsymbol{f}^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \sum_{i=1}^m\lambda_i(\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2 -t_i) + \sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top(\boldsymbol{y}_i-\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{b}_i) + \sum_{i=1}^m\nu_i(t_i - \boldsymbol{c}_i^\top\boldsymbol{x})\\
&=  (\boldsymbol{f}-\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top -\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{u}_i\boldsymbol{c}_i)^\top\boldsymbol{x} + \sum_{i=1}^m(\lambda_i\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2+\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{y}_i) \\
&\quad+ \sum_{i=1}^m(-\lambda_i+\nu_i)t_i-\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{b}_i+\nu_id_i)
\end{aligned}
$$

$$\begin{aligned}
p^\star = \min_{\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}}\max_{\boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu}} L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})
\end{aligned}
$$

$$\begin{aligned}
d^\star = \max_{\boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu}}\min_{\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}} L(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y}, \boldsymbol{t}, \boldsymbol{\lambda}, \boldsymbol{\mu}, \boldsymbol{\nu})
\end{aligned}
$$
$\boldsymbol{x}$$\min$
$$
\boldsymbol{f}-\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{A}_i^\top -\sum_{i=1}^m\boldsymbol{u}_i\boldsymbol{c}_i = 0,
$$

$\boldsymbol{y}_i$$\min$
$$
\min_{\boldsymbol{y}} \lambda_i\|\boldsymbol{y}_i\|_2+\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{y}_i = \left\{\begin{array}{ll}{0}&{\|\boldsymbol{\mu}_{i}\|_{2}\leq\lambda_{i}}\\{-\infty}&{\mathrm{otherwise}.}\end{array}\right.
$$
$\lambda_i = \nu_i$$\boldsymbol{t}$$\min$
SOCP
$$
\begin{array}{ll}
\max   & -\sum_{i=1}^m(\boldsymbol{\mu}_i^\top\boldsymbol{b}_i+\nu_id_i)\\
\mathrm{s.~t.} & \boldsymbol{f} - \sum_{i=1}^m \boldsymbol{A}_i^\top\boldsymbol{\mu}_i - \sum_{i=1}^m\nu_i\boldsymbol{c}_i =0,\quad i=1,\ldots,m, \\
&\|\boldsymbol{\mu}_i\|\leq \lambda_i, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,\\
&-\lambda_i+\nu_i=0, \quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{array}
$$
$\boldsymbol{\mu}_i=\boldsymbol{u}_i, \lambda_i=\nu_i=v_i$SOCP

## 
(RC)
$$\begin{aligned}&\min\quad c^\top x\\
&\mathrm{s.~t.}\quad(a_i+u_i)^Tx\leq b_i\text{ for all }\|u_i\|_2\leq1,\quad i=1,\ldots,m,
\end{aligned}$$
$a_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$b_i\in\mathbb{R}$$u_i\in\mathbb{R}^n$$c\in\mathbb{R}^n$
$u_i$$\ell_2$$\|u_i\|_2\leq1$
RC:
$$\begin{aligned}&\min\quad c^Tx\\&\mathrm{s.~t.}\quad a_i^Tx+\|x\|_2\leq b_i,\quad i=1,\ldots,m,\end{aligned}$$


## Python
CVXPYSOCP
```python
import cvxpy as cp
import numpy as np

# Generate a random feasible SOCP.
m = 3
n = 5
np.random.seed(2)
c = np.random.random(n)
A = np.random.random((m, n))
x0 = np.random.random(n)
b = A@x0

x = cp.Variable(n)
obj = cp.Minimize(c @ x)
soc_constraints = [
    cp.SOC(b[i] - A[i]@x, x) for i in range(m)
]
prob = cp.Problem(obj, soc_constraints)
prob.solve()
print("status:", prob.status)
print("optimal value", prob.value)
print("optimal var", x.value)
for i in range(m):
    print("soc constraint", soc_constraints[i].dual_value)
```

AiRnin,biRni,ciRn,diR,xRn,i=1,,mA_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i\times n},\boldsymbol{b}_i\in\mathbb{R}^{n_i},\boldsymbol{c}_i\in\mathbb{R}^n,d_i\in\mathbb{R},\boldsymbol{x}\in\mathbb{R}^n, i=1,\ldots,mAiRnin,biRni,ciRn,diR,xRn,i=1,,m

uiRn\boldsymbol{u}_i\in\mathbb{R}^nuiRnviRv_i\in\mathbb{R}viRi=1,,mi=1,\ldots,mi=1,,m

## 
### Kantorovich 
|  | |
|---|---|
|$\mathcal{K}$| |
|$y_k\in\{0,1\}$|$k$10|
|$x_i^k$| $k$$w_i$|


$$\begin{aligned}
&\text{min} \sum_{k\in\mathcal{K}}y_k \\
&\text{s.t.} \sum_{k\in\mathcal{K}}x_i^k\geq n_i,\quad i=1,\ldots,m,\quad\text{(demand)} \\
&\sum_{i=1}^nw_ix_i^k\leq Wy_k,\quad k\in\mathcal{K},\quad\text{(width limitation)} \\
&x_i^k\in\mathbb{Z}_+, y_k\in\{0,1\}.
\end{aligned}$$
